mapper.insert: insert into portfolio (portfolio_id, member_id, portfolio_title, portfolio_start_date, portfolio_end_date, portfolio_detail) values (portfolio_seq.nextval,#{member_id},#{portfolio_title},sysdate,sysdate,#{portfolio_detail})
mapper.select: select * from portfolio where member_id = #{member_id} order by portfolio_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into portfolio_language(portfolio_id, portfolio_language, portfolio_language_seq) values( #{portfolio_id}, #{portfolio_language}, portfolio_language_seq.nextval )
mapper.select: select portfolio_language, count(*) from portfolio_language_view where member_id=#{member_id} group by rollup(portfolio_language) order by portfolio_language
